item.title: Venice Horizons Opening Film ‘Mother,’ Starring Noomi Rapace as Mother Teresa, Unveils First Trailer (EXCLUSIVE)
item.description: Variety is exclusively unveiling the first trailer for “Mother,” starring Noomi Rapace as Mother Teresa, which is opening the Venice Film Festival’s Horizons strand. Kinology handles
